subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the trade deadline looming, the Mets started a critical series with the Braves by beating them in the 11th inning on a single by Ruben Tejada.
snippet: With the trade deadline looming, the Mets started a critical series with the Braves by beating them in the 11th inning on a single by Ruben Tejada.
